column1: 12014-03-12 11:38:01New Sorting/Export preferences"This will add a new "File Sorting" Tab to the preferences that allows to exactly specify the sort and export order of entries
column2: rather than the rather limited set of choices that were available to date.\

22014-03-12 18:29:22Basic gradle integrationThis adds basic gradle integration. The project files for Intellij and Eclipse can be generated and JabRef can be started from within the IDEs as well as the tests can be run with errors. \
